detail.detailText: BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable}invalidVariables; Fault Data is <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><jbi:message xmlns:sxeh="http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling" type="sxeh:faultMessage" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part>BPCOR-6175: Invalid document &lt;?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?&gt;&lt;item xmlns="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/shipping"/&gt; is assigned to Item in BP instance (192.168.2.6:19bc513d:12d7fe559d4:-7f0a) at line 166 BP {http://enterprise.netbeans.org/bpel/lab2_25_nemesis/lab2_25_nemesis}OrderProcess</jbi:part></jbi:message>. Sending errors for the pending requests in the process scope before terminating the process instance Caused by: BPCOR-6175: Invalid document <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><item xmlns="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/shipping"/> is assigned to Item in BP instance (192.168.2.6:19bc513d:12d7fe559d4:-7f0a) at line 166 BP {http://enterprise.netbeans.org/bpel/lab2_25_nemesis/lab2_25_nemesis}OrderProcess BPCOR-6129: Line Number is 166 BPCOR-6130: Activity Name is AssignItem Caused by: Too many elements: {null}quantity
